entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 07:34 AM AST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 07:34 AM AST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 07:34 AM AST Thursday 29 December 2022
